column5: Good guess, Cudz. This lake in NW Ont. seems to have just finished the spawn within the last 3 weeks, so these big females have a lot of filling out to do yet. I was thinking an even 4lbs.

Yeah maybe closer to 4.  I can't tell the girth.  Generally when I see the fish live I have a good shot.  I caught one the other day and guessed it was 3.4 pounds.  On digital it was 3.37.  Last night I guessed 2.4 pounds and it was 2.34 pounds.  Last week I guessed 3.8 and the fish was 3.95.  I am getting better at this game.
Mister 7lber Im knockin on your door next week
Fantastic..what a beaut!
well done... Lately I'd settle for half that size!
you look awfully excited for your first 6 pounder lol.  Nice fish man!
Haaaaaa thanks ya I dont know why I dont smile.
Nice smallie. Nothing fights like a big SM.
Good size fish bud! What did you fool him with?
That fight must of been one to remember. Congratulations on a fantastic catch man.  MTBF
The fight was awsome jumped about 4 feet couldnt beleive it.Got it on a gulp minnow with a knucklball jig head.
I'd say a good 3.5lbs   jk.  Nice fish!
Gorgeous catch dude!  Next time smile with the 7lb'er!
Berkley scale said 6
Serious beast    What a hawg!!! Congrats
I was thinking the same thing... better not play any poker with this guy
Nice fish & congrats I got a  5.5 lber yesterday & they do fight, did you take it home Richard
Very nice Lunker there
No I didnt take it home I always let them go.
nice fish indeed.  ( 20.5 X 15.5 x 15.5 ) / 800 = 6.15 pounds. Yep, I buy it.  That is a fat fish the numbers add up.
shes a beaut!
Great catch, care to share the lake or body of water?  Dirk...
Nice to here you released it next year you may have your 7lber Richard
Its a lake in the bruce peninsula.My parents have a place up there been fishing that lake about 20 years.
This one was close to 5lbs

Awesome! Hard to gauge weight on a smallie from the "brag shot". But thanks for putting up the tape pics with the girth. Those solidify it's definately a pig. Great job releasing that to be caught another day as well.  What do you guys think this one goes weight wise? It's 19.5".
4.41 pounds
